message: It was inside a void of darkness. Even though my eyes were open, I couldn’t see anything.
I remember up to the point where I tried to leave the Archives chasing after Thomas, who had Cordelia with him, but........

name: Voice
message: Finally... all of the pieces are in place.

name: Jonathan
message: Who... are you...

name: Voice
message: Are you asking me that？ I can't believe you finally decided to listen to this voice... How pathetic I am！

name: Jonathan
message: You... Every time I lost consciousness, you slipped in. ...And then showed me dreams... bizarre songs...

name: Voice
message: That's right. Did you like the dream I showed you？ Well, everything in it really happened though. It's just that the one who did it was...

name: Jonathan
message: Like I'd know！
Why　are　you　giving　me　a　dream　like　this...？
Whether it's a dream or reality, what the hell does that have to do with me！

name: Voice
message: You'll understand soon enough. You're about to witness the end of the Monastery firsthand.

name: Jonathan
message: I don't want to have dreams like this anymore！ I have to go look for Cordelia.

name: Voice
message: Your will is already under the control of my power. There's no way you can escape from this curse.

name: Sarah
message: Lushion-sama........

name: Sarah
message: I have to save Lushion no matter what.

name: Sarah
message: But... what should I do？

name: Lushion
message: If you think I'm going to give in to you guys, you're dead wrong. Let me go right now and get out of the institute.

name: Lushion
message: Otherwise, the Inquisition will be waiting for you. And for you, it's the guillotine.

name: Pietro
message: Hah！ She's a tough woman. Even though her hands and feet are shackled, she can still talk like that.

name: Lushion
message: If I don't go back, the Cardinal will just send in the next spy.

name: Pietro
message: You sure talk a lot for a girl. Are you scared or something？

name: Angelica
message: I can’t believe you’d show yourself in such a pathetic state. It’s honestly hilarious.

name: Pietro
message: I heard from Maria, but apparently you're quite a sinful woman. They say you got deeply involved with the priest who's supposed to be your guardian, and even had his kid.

name: Pietro
message: Maria snitched about that, and because of it, you had to get an abortion.

name: Pietro
message: She's a woman who committed a huge sin no nun should ever commit！ I was waiting for a woman with such deep karma to show up.

name: Lushion
message: What are you planning to do......

name: Pietro
message: Nah, it's not that complicated.

name: Pietro
message: You just need to deal with the monster over there.

name: Lushion
message: Wha‥‥‥‥‥what did you say？

name: Pietro
message: You still don't get it？ I want you to have that monster's semen poured inside your body, and make a half-breed between a monster and a human.

name: Pietro
message: It might be painful at first, but you'll get used to it soon.

name: Pietro
message: In fact, a lot of women, after going insane from how horrifying it was, started thrusting their hips and writhed around in ecstasy, tears of joy streaming down their faces.

name: Lushion
message: Th-there's absolutely no way I'd ever do something like that！

name: Pietro
message: I'm not asking you, you know？

name: Lushion
message: How can you do something so inhuman? How many innocent nuns have you done that to up until now?

name: Pietro
message: All of them. There are probably women I don't even know myself, since there were times I finished things while they were asleep.

name: Lushion
message: That kind of thing...

name: Angelica
message: You're so stubborn, Lushion. Just give up already and let yourself be turned into that monster.

name: Angelica
message: Seriously... what a sight！

name: Pietro
message: This monster is a real pain in the ass. It's hard to kill, but in exchange, it grows slowly and is hard to be born in the first place.

name: Pietro
message: To summon Cthulhu, you need a ton of bait. With the number we've got now, it's nowhere near enough.

name: Lushion
message: Cthulhu, you say？

name: Pietro
message: Looks like you know. It's about a god who has powerful strength and lives in the world of darkness.

name: Lushion
message: How do you know about that...? The Necronomicon is supposed to be the only one, locked away in the Vatican's forbidden library.

name: Pietro
message: I got my hands on it.
The very last copy of the English translation of the original Arabic manuscript written by Abdul Alhazred.

name: Pietro
message: Well, I first learned about that god before I got my hands on the Necronomicon.

name: Pietro
message: I saw some natives on an island worshipping it. Most likely, Abdul Alhazred saw the same thing and that's why he wrote the Necronomicon.

name: Pietro
message: Those trash had no choice but to fear and worship it, but I'm different.

name: Pietro
message: I'll take the angry god into my own hands and obtain that great power called Cthulhu.

name: Lushion
message: There's no way I could do something like that......

name: Pietro
message: I learned from reading the Necronomicon that Cthulhu will not awaken unless a massive amount of 'things to be fed'-in other words, Deep Ones-are provided.

name: Pietro
message: Like I said earlier, Deep Ones don't increase easily, so that's why I thought about mixing them with humans.

name: Lushion
message: How could you... You're a devil.

name: Pietro
message: The natives didn't even realize they were being made into 'things to be fed' themselves, so why would it be wrong for me to do the same？

name: Angelica
message: Enough with your speeches already！

name: Angelica
message: It's about time I get to calmly watch your face twist in shame.

name: Angelica
message: I'll laugh at you as you revel in getting soaked by a filthy monster's semen！

name: Pietro
message: Not happening. You're going to end up as food for the Deep Ones too, together with this woman.

name: Angelica
message: What did you say！

name: Angelica
message: No way, why would I-

name: Pietro
message: You've been a bit too uppity. I don't like it when others butt into my business.

name: Angelica
message: Ngh... Let me go！

name: Pietro
message: Weren't you fighting with that woman over the cult leader？ You really shouldn't abandon an old friend like that.

name: Angelica
message: N-no way！ Why do I have to be with such a filthy monster...

name: Pietro
message: You're no longer needed. Maria will take your place, so don't worry about it.

name: Angelica
message: You awful man！ You were just using me, weren't you?

name: Pietro
message: Nai, chain Angelica to the shackles.

name: Pietro
message: That other woman can't even move her numb hands and feet now, she won't be able to run. Just leave her lying on the floor.

name: Nai
message: This time it'll work, right？ There's no more room for failure.

name: Pietro
message: I tossed the new medicine I made into the soup pot. This time should be fine.

name: Angelica
message: W-what did you say？
So I was being set up from the start！

name: Pietro
message: Well then, enjoy yourself-savor the taste of your last pleasure in this world.

name: Angelica
message: Ugh... please...

name: Angelica
message: Why are you doing this to me? I've always served you faithfully...

name: Pietro
message: Why, you ask？ How insulting. You girls were chosen as shrine maidens. Offer your bodies to me and my god, become the sacrifice for our covenant.

name: Lushion
message: I don't care about your god！ Even if you kill me, I won't do what you want.

name: Pietro
message: How long can you keep pretending to be tough... Once tonight is over, you'll become a sacrifice too.

name: Pietro
message: Whether you like it or not, you don't really get to choose.

name: Angelica
message: I've served you faithfully all this time！　　　　　　　　And yet... and yet...

name: Pietro
message: That means you're no longer needed. The time has come... the time of awakening is near.

name: Pietro
message: The women who had the Deep One's seed implanted in their wombs will soon begin to give birth to cursed children.

name: Angelica
message: Ah... I don't want that. To end up like those women, writhing and suffering as they gave birth to filthy babies right in front of me...

name: Pietro
message: It's already too late, don't you get it? Do you even know what's happening inside your own belly?

name: Angelica
message: No！ I don't want that abomination... inside me！

name: Lushion
message: Nn...D-Do you really think you can make me submit...with something like this？

name: Lushion
message: Foolish...just how foolish can you be...

name: Pietro
message: Ohhh...

name: Pietro
message: Keep tormenting these accursed ones...More！

name: Lushion
message: Ugh...

name: Pietro
message: Filthy creature！

name: Pietro
message: You started thrusting your hips and came from being with a Deep One.

name: Pietro
message: You women are no different from those monsters. Stupid, shameless, and completely lacking in virtue.

name: Pietro
message: No matter who it is, if you grind your hips and get filled with cum, you'll get pregnant. Go ahead and give birth to that filthy, cursed child！

name: Pietro
message: Soon, this village will be overflowing with Deep Ones.　　　　　　　That's when Cthulhu will break his long silence.

name: Pietro
message: You’re going to give birth to the child that’ll be their food. Isn’t that an honor beyond compare？

name: Lushion
message: Damn you, demon... May you be cursed！

name: Pietro
message: I'm not scared of threats like that.

name: Pietro
message: Now you see just how powerless that so-called god you worship really is, right? Gods without any power should all just be thrown into the sea together！

name: Pietro
message: They'll be here soon.

name: Pietro
message: The god of anger will shatter all your illusions.

name: Lushion
message: "Sarah...... run...... hurry！"

name: Pietro
message: There's no guarantee you'll even survive until then.

name: Lushion
message: 《Don't come！》

name: Lushion
message: Sarah！

name: Sarah
message: Lushion-sama.........

name: Sarah
message: I wanted to help you sooner...... but there was nothing I could do.

name: Sarah
message: If only I could have helped sooner‥‥‥‥

name: Lushion
message: It's okay... it's okay now.

name: Sarah
message: But！

name: Lushion
message: Just get over here.

name: Lushion
message: Sarah, you saw everything that's happened until now, right？

name: Lushion
message: So, you know what's happening in this monastery, and what that monster did to me, right?

name: Sarah
message: I don't know... I don't know anything！

name: Lushion
message: Don't lie. You understand everything, don't you?

name: Sarah
message: Noo... I don't wanna understand！

name: Lushion
message: Sarah！
Calm down and listen. This is something only you can do.

name: Sarah
message: Yes... Lushion-sama...

name: Lushion
message: You can be sure that every woman in this monastery, just like me, has been impregnated with that monster's seed.

name: Sarah
message: ......well then......

name: Lushion
message: If a woman who had semen planted inside her gave birth to a half-breed child with that accursed monster‥‥‥‥

name: Lushion
message: Someone else will be driven mad with desire, just like this man, and a tragedy will happen all over again.

name: Sarah
message: That can't be‥‥‥No, that's not true！ I don't　　　　　think humans are that evil！

name: Lushion
message: Yeah... but, it's weak.
Even this guy, if he just hadn't crossed paths with something evil, probably wouldn't have ended up being used for the revival of the evil god.

name: Sarah
message: ...Lushion-sama...even so...

name: Lushion
message: ...Sarah.
If you hadn't saved me back then, I would've drowned in my desires, seeking pleasure, and eventually ended up opening my body to that monster myself.

name: Sarah
message: Ah... no way...

name: Lushion
message: ...That's why...okay？ We absolutely can't let a single nun leave this place.

name: Sarah
message: ...Yeah...

name: Lushion
message: Set the monastery on fire. Make sure you prepare thoroughly so that no one escapes.

name: Sarah
message: But... then Lushion-sama too！

name: Lushion
message: I know it's hard, but please endure it. This is something only you can do.

name: Sarah
message: There's no way I could ever kill Lushion-sama...

name: Sarah
message: To part with Lushion... and go on living all by myself...

name: Sarah
message: And also, the women in this monastery...

name: Sarah
message: Innocent women who don't know anything...

name: Sarah
message: I'm trying to burn them to death！

name: Sarah
message: My face is reflected in the oily film on the barrel.

name: Sarah
message: ...That's the face of a killer...

name: Sarah
message: Ah...! Lushion-sama!

name: Sarah
message: This sin is way too much for me to bear！

name: Sarah
message: With this sin, I can't live alone...

name: Sarah
message: Lushion-sama...... Aren't you cold？

name: Lushion
message: Yeah, I don't feel anything anymore.

name: Sarah
message: You can still stop now.
Why don't you go home and talk it over with the cardinal？

name: Lushion
message: No, we don't have time to be doing that.
This guy is gonna get away.

name: Sarah
message: Lushion-sama.........well, I’ll be off then......

name: Lushion
message: Wait up, Sarah.

name: Lushion
message: You...

name: Lushion
message: Surely, you're not thinking of doing something stupid, right？

name: Lushion
message: Sarah... you don't have to suffer, you know.

name: Lushion
message: Sarah... It's okay if you hate me.

name: Lushion
message: Even though I knew something terrible was happening at this monastery, I still dragged you into it......

name: Lushion
message: Sarah, I probably... have no right to call myself your guardian.

name: Lushion
message: But, just one last thing...... Listen to what I have to say.

name: Lushion
message: Live...... Sarah.

name: Lushion
message: After something like this happened, you probably can't work serving God anymore, and you probably don't feel like it either.　　　　　　　　But that's okay.

name: Lushion
message: Sarah... Be happy.

name: Lushion
message: Humans are weak, and sinful......

name: Lushion
message: But, that's exactly why you have to seek happiness.　　　　　　　　You understand, right, Sarah………

name: Lushion
message: ...You can do it...

name: Sarah
message: 《Lushion-sama......》

name: Sarah
message: 《Please, forgive me.》

name: Sarah
message: 'Please forgive me for not being able to save you.'

name: Sarah
message: 《God, please guide the souls of these people......》

name: Jonathan
message: Are you saying this is what happened at this Monastery？

name: Voice
message: That's right. Everything you saw is the whole, unvarnished truth.

name: Jonathan
message: What does what that guy was doing have to do with me?　　　　　　　　It all turned to ashes along with the Monastery, didn't it?

name: Voice
message: Really？ If that's true, then why are you here？

name: Voice
message: Try to really remember what you saw and heard in Arkham.

name: Jonathan
message: What the hell！ What are you talking about.

name: Voice
message: Before long, you and I will meet again.

name: Voice
message: Before you make your final decision. Until then, you might as well suffer as much as you can.
